description: All activity is to be halted by the Shia group's political wing, and police carry out raids.
title: Hezbollah: Germany bans and raids Islamist group
title_page: Hezbollah: Germany bans and raids Islamist group - BBC News
maintext: The UK dropped the distinction in 2019, saying it could no longer distinguish between the two. The Netherlands, Japan, the US and Canada are among other countries that ban both wings.
